name: Cinapse
headline: The Operating System of Hollywood
description: Cinapse makes it easy for a film or television crew to manage tens of thousands of digital production documents and daily workflows. We do this by providing one simple app that all crew, cast, and office staff can use on Web, iOS, and Android.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:entertainment; industry:productivity; industry:enterprise; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Herman Phillips, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO @ Cinapse. Previously in the Assistant Directors department on major films and television series including Disney+'s The Mandalorian and The Book of Boba Fett; HBO's Silicon Valley, Euphoria, and Insecure; Steven Spielberg's The Fabelmans; and various other Netflix, HBO, Apple, Disney, and Hulu productions.

generated_description:
**Cinapse: The Operating System of Hollywood**

Founded in 2020, Cinapse aims to revolutionize the film and television production process. Their mission? To become the ultimate operating system for Hollywood, simplifying how crews manage the mountain of digital production documents and daily workflows. 

At its core, Cinapse offers a sleek, intuitive app that caters to the needs of everyone involved—crew, cast, and office staff—streamlining collaboration across platforms (Web, iOS, and Android). This is not just about solving problems; it's about reimagining how productions are organized.

Located in the heart of Los Angeles, CA, and backed by Y Combinator's Batch W22, Cinapse has swiftly grown to a team of just ten passionate employees. With Nan as their group partner, they’re well-positioned to tap into the intricate web of Hollywood’s production needs. 

What sets Cinapse apart? It’s built in partnership with over a thousand industry-leading Unit Production Managers (UPMs), Assistant Directors (ADs), and Producers, allowing their software to reflect real-world requirements. They’ve managed to capture a significant chunk of the Director’s Guild of America (DGA) and Director's Guild of Canada (DGC)—over 15% have already jumped on board.

Cinapse emphasizes productivity and clarity, drastically reducing the tedious back-and-forth communication typically required in production scheduling. Features like collaborative scheduling, episodic logic, and seamless file sharing empower teams to focus more on creativity and less on admin work. Need to adapt on the fly? No problem. Changes sync effortlessly, and you can continue working offline if necessary.

Moreover, Cinapse shines in customization—allowing users to tailor their interfaces and workflows to fit their unique styles. Their flexible design and robust security compliance cater to the nuanced requirements of major studios, ensuring that sensitive data is handled with care.

In a space where time is money, Cinapse is a breath of fresh air—a modern solution for a time-honored industry. Their holistic approach can drastically improve team communication and organization, ultimately enabling better storytelling.

If you’re curious to see how Cinapse can enhance your production processes, check them out at [Cinapse.io](https://cinapse.io). With an engaging and easy-to-use platform, it's designed not just for production professionals but by them—whether you're scheduling the next blockbuster or a small indie film. As they say, reimagine production, the Hollywood way.
